signals.problem_statement: The customer is struggling to manage and organize communications from multiple channels effectively.
signals.customer_ask: Looking to collate all different channels into one place.
signals.suggested_solution: Revert back to using Hiver for better workflow.
signals.context: Small business with a small team managing a marketplace.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is facing limitations with the current WhatsApp integration in Hiver.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to explore integrating WhatsApp into Hiver.
signals.suggested_solution: Find a way to manage WhatsApp communications more effectively.
signals.context: Small business with a small team managing a marketplace.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the cost of multiple subscriptions and is looking for a more budget-friendly solution.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to discuss the best case scenario on pricing.
signals.suggested_solution: Reinstate the previous plan or find a suitable pricing option.
signals.context: Small business with a small team managing a marketplace.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure about the capabilities of the AI features in Hiver and their associated costs.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to know if AI features are included in the plan.
signals.suggested_solution: Clarify the pricing and functionality of AI features.
signals.context: Small business with a small team managing a marketplace.
